name: CAT WORLD
description:
Find your way out of a mysterious forest in the first chapter of CAT WORLD, a narrative puzzle-adventure game for Playdate.  You play as Ember, a lost kitten making their way across a strange land loosely based off sketches I made as a kid (yes, really).

This first chapter is around fifteen minutes long. There is an auto-save between rooms, so you don't need to complete it in one sitting.

For notifications about future chapters, make sure to follow Pawprints on Itch.

CREDITS: Music by Triple. Game built with Pulp.
